name: bully-ball
description:
Welcome to bully-ball in this game you play as a school kid who is being bullied the bully and you must do a basket ball game to settle the score.

Hold down space to charge your throw do not hold it down to long or it may bounce of the wall and hit the spikes. Release space to throw the ball. When your 1 minute is up then its the bullies turn to play the bully will throw the ball and try and win just like you.

Who ever has the highest score wins have fun.
